data_table.description: Omni 1 Clinic Exam 1: Interview, Physical Exam, ECG. When the Omni 1 cohort was initiated, their first exam coincided with Offspring Exam 5. Hence, the Offspring Exam 5 form (with some modifications) was used for the Omni 1 Exam 1 clinic visit.

variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form the study participant's ID number.
